Package com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecordIterator<T>
    Iterator over records in the storage backend.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackendOperation  
    ByteBufferUtil
    Utility methods for dealing with ByteBuffer.
    DirectoryUtil
    Utility methods for dealing with directory structures that are not provided by Apache Commons.
    FileStorageConfiguration
    Implementation of storage backend properties using a local configuration file.
    Hex
    Utility methods for hexadecimal representation of bytes
    KeyColumn
    Class representing a (key, column) pair.
    NoLock
    Implementation of a lock that has no effect, i.e.
    ReadArrayBuffer
    Implementation of ReadBuffer against a byte array.
    ReadByteBuffer
    Implementation of ReadBuffer against a ByteBuffer Note, that the position does not impact the state of the object.
    StaticArrayBuffer
    Implementation of StaticBuffer against byte array.
    StaticByteBuffer
    Implementation of StaticBuffer against a ByteBuffer
    TimeUtility
    Utility methods for measuring fine time intervals
    WriteBufferUtil  
    WriteByteBuffer
